parameter-maker.EncloseAllSectionsWithIn: Enclose all selections with input characters
parameter-maker.ReselectLineFromText.tit: Split a line of selected text and Reselect it
parameter-maker.ReselectWordsFromText.ti: Split and Reselect words in the selected text
parameter-maker.PerformRangeSelectionsWi: Perform range selection with regular expression delimitation
parameter-maker.MergeNLines.title: Merge N lines of selected text into one line
parameter-maker.CopySelectedTextNTimes.t: Copy the selected text N times
parameter-maker.FilterSelectionByIndexIn: Filter Selection by Index In Line
parameter-maker.ReselectTextWithRegExp.t: Reselect selected text with regular expression
parameter-maker.ParameterizeSelectionWit: Parameterize the selection with the input string
parameter-maker.CopySelectedText.title: Copy selected text as many lines as there are lines in the clipboard.
